casebody.data:
A.C.L. MORTGAGE SERVICES, L.L.C. d/b/a Kngs Financial Consulting, Plaintiff,
v.
RUNSKIPSHOP, L.L.C. and William W. Hardin, IV, Defendants. No. COA15-249. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Feb. 2, 2016.

Case Reported Without Published Opinion

Affirmed in part, Reversed in part and Remanded.
